basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Agrobacterium tumefaciens (MIC=0.2 µg/ml), Erwinia salicis (MIC=0.02 µg/ml), Escherichia coli (MIC=0.2 µg/ml), Pseudomonas syringae (MIC=0.1 µg/ml), Rhizobium meliloti (MIC=0.02 µg/ml), Salmonella Newport (MIC=0.2 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=0.1 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Shigella flexneri (MIC=0.1 µg/ml), Corynebacterium insidiosum (MIC=100 µg/ml), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=100 µg/ml)
